TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormRecognizerClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The client to use to connect to the Form Recognizer Azure Cognitive Service to recognize information from forms and images and extract into structured data. It provides the ability to analyze receipts, to recognize form content, and to extract fields from custom forms with models trained on custom form types.
